tool_description: Get Screenshot of Webpage in Seconds
name: Screenshot API ( Geekflare )
title: Screenshot API ( Geekflare )

api_list.name: Get Screenshot
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://screenshot-api-geekflare.p.rapidapi.com/screenshot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "screenshot-api-geekflare.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://screenshot-api-geekflare.p.rapidapi.com/screenshot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "screenshot-api-geekflare.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
